properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_IMAGE, BOARD_INPUTAREA) VALUES(SEQ_NO_BOARD.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_INPUTAREA) VALUES(SEQ_NO_BOARD.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_IMAGE = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TIME, BOARD_ST FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_IMAGE, BOARD_INPUTAREA,BOARD_TIME, MEMBER_ID FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_IMAGE, BOARD_INPUTAREA, BOARD_TIME, BOARD_ST, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE BOARD_NO <= ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_ST = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND MEMBER_ID = ?
